info.description:
Some ground rules are in order...

1.) Girls are not to be wedgied!! They're allowed to give wedgies, but that's it! Understand?

2.) For the love of God, PLEASE have proper grammar, sentence structure, and spelling!! I want to actually READ what you write without gouging out my eyeballs!

3.) Naruto is the main wedgie victim. If you want to have other male victims get wedgies occasionally, fine. But keep the focus on Naruto!!

4.) Keep the content rated Pg-13.

5.) Be as creative as possible.

9.) DON'T PLAGERIZE

Ps: Most of the stories takes place before the time skip. However, if one of the wedgie givers is a character that first appears in the time skip, then you're allowed to have the story take place during that period. Other than that, make sure the rest of the stories take place in the pre time skip, understand?
